verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H8104>Keep<s%> ye <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6666>justice<s%>: for my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%>, and my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to be <S%H1540>revealed<s%>.

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H582>man<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> this, and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> that layeth <S%H2388>hold<s%> on it; that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> from <S%H2490>polluting<s%> it, and <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H6213>doing<s%> any <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

¶ Neither let the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H5236>stranger<s%>, that hath <S%H3867>joined<s%> himself to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>speak<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H914>utterly<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> me from his <S%H5971>people<s%>: neither let the <S%H5631>eunuch<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, Behold, I am a <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> that <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, and <S%H977>choose<s%> the things that <S%H2654>please<s%> me, and take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>;

Even unto them will I <S%H5414>give<s%> in mine <S%H1004>house<s%> and within my <S%H2346>walls<s%> a <S%H3027>place<s%> and a <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and of <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, that shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.

Also the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5236>stranger<s%>, that <S%H3867>join<s%> themselves to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H8334>serve<s%> him, and to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to be his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, every one that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> from <S%H2490>polluting<s%> it, and taketh <S%H2388>hold<s%> of my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>;

Even them will I <S%H935>bring<s%> to my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and make them <S%H8055>joyful<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8605>prayer<s%>: their burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> upon mine <S%H4196>altar<s%>; for mine <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for all <S%H5971>people<s%>.

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> which <S%H6908>gathereth<s%> the <S%H1760>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%>, Yet will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> others to him, beside those that are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> unto him.
¶ All ye <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H857>come<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%>, yea, all ye <S%H2416>beasts<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest<s%>.

His <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> are <S%H5787>blind<s%>: they are all <S%H3045>ignorant<s%>, they are all <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H3611>dogs<s%>, they <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H5024>bark<s%>; <S%H1957>sleeping<s%>, lying <S%H7901>down<s%>, <S%H157>loving<s%> to <S%H5123>slumber<s%>.

Yea, they are <S%H5794%H5315>greedy<s%> <S%H3611>dogs<s%> which <S%H3045>can<s%> never <S%H3045>have<s%> <S%H7654>enough<s%>, and they are <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> that cannot <S%H995>understand<s%>: they all <S%H6437>look<s%> to their own <S%H1870>way<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> for his <S%H1215>gain<s%>, from his <S%H7097>quarter<s%>.

<S%H857>Come<s%> ye, say they, I will <S%H3947>fetch<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and we will <S%H5433>fill<s%> ourselves with strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>; and to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> shall be as this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H3966>much<s%> <S%H3499>more<s%> <S%H1419>abundant<s%>.
